dcterms:description: ViQuAE is a dataset for Knowledge-based Visual Question Answering about Named Entities. It contains 3,700 questions paired with images, annotated using a semi-automatic method. The dataset includes a wide range of entity types and is associated with a knowledge base composed of 1.5 million Wikipedia articles, including text and images.
dcterms:title: ViQuAE

dcterms:creator: Sameer Joshi
Ellie Choi
Daniel Weld
Lucas Zettlemoyer
dcterms:description: TriviaQA is a dataset for question answering that includes a large number of questions and answers, used in the paper to generate questions for the ViQuAE dataset.
dcterms:title: TriviaQA
